maml:description.maml:para: Connect to a Unifi Controller.
The Connect-UnifiController function connects to the Unifi Controller, specified with Set-UnifiAPIConfig, with the given credentials.

maml:Description.maml:para: PSCredential Object containing the username and password used to connect to the Unifi Controller.
PSCredential Object containing the username and password used to connect to the Unifi Controller.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: PS C:\> Set-UnifiAPIConfig -BaseUri unifi.contoso.com PS C:\> Connect-UnifiController -Credential (Get-Credential)

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example configures the connection with Set-UnifiAPIConfig, then connects to the BaseUri configured.

maml:description.maml:para: Disconnects from the Unifi Controller.
The Disconnect-UnifiController function disconnects from the connected Unifi Controller.

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example disconnects from the Unifi Controller.

maml:description.maml:para: Retrieves Unifi Controller admin users.
The Get-UnifiAdminUsers function retrieves administrative users from the Unifi Controller.

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example retrieves the administrative users.

maml:description.maml:para: Retrieves server details from the Unifi Controller.
The Get-UnifiController function retrieves server details from the Unifi Controller. This function does not require an existing logged in connection to a Unifi Controller.

maml:Description.maml:para: The address of the Unifi Controller, not including protocol or port.
TCP port used to connect to the Unifi Controller.
If true, skips the certificate check when sending requests to the REST API, needed if using a self-signed certificate on Unifi Controller.
The address of the Unifi Controller, not including protocol or port.
TCP port used to connect to the Unifi Controller.
If true, skips the certificate check when sending requests to the REST API, needed if using a self-signed certificate on Unifi Controller.

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example queries the Unifi Controller to retrieve the server details.

maml:description.maml:para: Retrieves details about the currently logged in user from the Unifi Controller.
The Get-UnifiLoggedInUser function retrieves details about the currently logged in user from the Unifi Controller.

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example connects retrieves the details about the currently logged in user.

maml:description.maml:para: Retrieves Unifi Controller site details.
The Get-UnifiSite function retrieves details about a Unifi Controller site, by providing the site name.

maml:Description.maml:para: The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve details for.
The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve details for.

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example retrieves details for the site named "Contoso".

maml:description.maml:para: Retrieves clients that have connected to the Unifi Controller.
The Get-UnifiSiteClients function retrieves the clients that have connected to the Unifi Controller.

maml:Description.maml:para: The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve clients for.
If true, the Unifi Controller will only list the clients that are currently active.
If true, the Unifi Controller will only list the clients that are currently active.
The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve clients for.

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example retrieves active clients connected to the Unifi Controller site named "Contoso".

maml:description.maml:para: Retrieves list of site country codes from the Unifi Controller.
The Get-UnifiSiteCountryCodes function retrieves a listing of country codes from the Unifi Controller for the specified site.

maml:Description.maml:para: The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve country codes for.
The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve country codes for.

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example retrieves country codes for the site named "Contoso".

maml:description.maml:para: Retrieves site dynamic DNS configuration from the Unifi Controller.
The Get-UnifiSiteDDNSConfig function retrieves the dynamic DNS configuration from the Unifi Controller for the specified site.

maml:Description.maml:para: The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve dynamic DNS configuration for.
The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve dynamic DNS configuration for.

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example retrieves the dynamic DNS configuration for the site named "Contoso".

maml:description.maml:para: Retrieves site dynamic DNS information from the Unifi Controller.
The Get-UnifiSiteDDNSInfo function retrieves the dynamic DNS information from the Unifi Controller for the specified site.

maml:Description.maml:para: The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve dynamic DNS information for.
The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve dynamic DNS information for.

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example retrieves the dynamic DNS information for the site named "Contoso".

maml:description.maml:para: Retrieves Unifi Controller site devices.
The Get-UnifiSiteDevices function retrieves a listing of devices from the Unifi Controller for a spcified site. The output can either be in a basic or detailed format.

maml:Description.maml:para: The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve devices for.
If true, returns a detailed view of devices.
If true, returns a detailed view of devices.
The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve devices for.

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example returns a simple view of devices in the site named "Contoso".

maml:description.maml:para: Retrieves Unifi Controller site events.
The Get-UnifiSiteEvents function retrieves the last 3000 events from a Unifi Controller for a specified site.

maml:Description.maml:para: The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve site alarms for.
The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve site alarms for.

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example retrieves the last 3000 events for the site named "Contoso".

maml:description.maml:para: Retrieves site health from Unifi Controller.
The Get-UnifiSiteHealth function retrieves the health status from a Unifi Controller

maml:Description.maml:para: The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve site health for.
The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve site health for.

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example retrieves the health status for the site named "Contoso".

maml:description.maml:para: Retrieves site port forwards from the Unifi Controller.
The Get-UnifiSitePortForwards function retrieves the port forwards from the Unifi Controller for the specified site.

maml:Description.maml:para: The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve port forwards for.
The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve port forwards for.

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example retrieves the port forwards for the site named "Contoso".

maml:description.maml:para: Retrieves RADIUS accounts from the Unifi Controller.
The Get-UnifiSiteRadiusAccounts function retrieves RADIUS accounts from the Unifi Controller for the specified site.

maml:Description.maml:para: The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve RADIUS accounts for.
The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve RADIUS accounts for.

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example retrieves RADIUS accounts for the site named "Contoso".

maml:description.maml:para: Retrieves RADIUS profiles from the Unifi Controller.
The Get-UnifiSiteRadiusProfiles function retrieves RADIUS profiles from the Unifi Controller for the specified site.

maml:Description.maml:para: The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve RADIUS profiles for.
The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve RADIUS profiles for.

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example retrieves RADIUS profiles for the site named "Contoso".

maml:description.maml:para: Retrieves site RF channels from Unifi Controller.
The Get-UnifiSiteRFChannels function retrieves the RF channels in use from the Unifi Controller for a specified site.

maml:Description.maml:para: The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve RF channels in use for.
The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve RF channels in use for.

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example retrieves the RF channels in use for the site named "Contoso".

maml:description.maml:para: Retrieves detected rogue access points from the Unifi Controller.
The Get-UnifiSiteRogueAPs function retrieves detected rogue access points from the Unifi Controller for the specified site.

maml:Description.maml:para: The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve detected rogue access points for.
The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve detected rogue access points for.

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example retrieves a list of rogue access points detected for the site named "Contoso".

maml:description.maml:para: Retrieves all routes from the Unifi Controller.
The Get-UnifiSiteRoutes function retrieves all routes from the Unifi Controller for the specified site.

maml:Description.maml:para: The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve all routes for.
The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve all routes for.

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example retrieves all routes for the site named "Contoso".

maml:description.maml:para: Retrieves site listing from the Unifi Controller.
The Get-UnifiSites function retrieves a listing of sites and optionally their health from a Unifi Controller.

maml:Description.maml:para: Option to show health details for the sites retrieved.
Option to show health details for the sites retrieved.

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example retrieves a listing of sites including their health.

maml:description.maml:para: Retrieves spectrum scan results from the Unifi Controller.
The Get-UnifiSiteSpectrumScan function retrieves spectrum scan results from the Unifi Controller for the specified site.

maml:Description.maml:para: The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve spectrum scan results for.
The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve spectrum scan results for.

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example retrieves spectrum scan results for the site named "Contoso".

maml:description.maml:para: Retrieves switch port profiles from the Unifi Controller.
The Get-UnifiSiteSwitchPortProfiles function retrieves spectrum scan results from the Unifi Controller for the specified site.

maml:Description.maml:para: The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve switch port profiles for.
The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve switch port profiles for.

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example retrieves switch port profiles for the site named "Contoso".

maml:description.maml:para: Retrieves tagged MAC addresses from the Unifi Controller.
The Get-UnifiSiteTaggedMACs function retrieves tagged MAC addresses from the Unifi Controller for the specified site.

maml:Description.maml:para: The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve tagged MACs for.
The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve tagged MACs for.

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example retrieves tagged MACs for the site named "Contoso".

maml:description.maml:para: Retrieves custom firewall groups from the Unifi Controller.
The Get-UnifiSiteUserFirewallGroups function retrieves custom firewall groups from the Unifi Controller for the specified site.

maml:Description.maml:para: The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve custom firewall groups for.
The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve custom firewall groups for.

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example retrieves custom firewall groups for the site named "Contoso".

maml:description.maml:para: Retrieves custom firewall rules from the Unifi Controller.
The Get-UnifiSiteUserFirewallRules function retrieves custom firewall rules from the Unifi Controller for the specified site.

maml:Description.maml:para: The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve custom firewall rules for.
The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve custom firewall rules for.

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example retrieves custom firewall rules for the site named "Contoso".

maml:description.maml:para: Retrieves custom routes from the Unifi Controller.
The Get-UnifiSiteUserRoutes function retrieves custom routes from the Unifi Controller for the specified site.

maml:Description.maml:para: The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve custom routes for.
The name of the site in the Unifi Controller to retrieve custom routes for.

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example retrieves custom routes for the site named "Contoso".

maml:description.maml:para: Removes variables configured by Set-UnifiAPIConfig.
The Remove-UnifiAPIConfig clears the configuration set by Set-UnifiAPIConfig by removing the variables.

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example removes the Unifi configuration.

maml:description.maml:para: Sets the Unifi API configuration for connecting to a Unifi Controller.

The Set-UnifiAPIConfig function sets the Unifi API configuration items for connecting to a Unifi Controller. When the module loads, default values for Port (8443), Protocol (https), and SkipCertificateCheck (false) are set.

maml:Description.maml:para: The address of the Unifi Controller, not including protocol or port.
TCP port used to connect to the Unifi Controller.
If true, skips the certificate check when sending requests to the REST API, needed if using a self-signed certificate on Unifi Controller.
Web Request session created when connecting to the Unifi Controller.
The address of the Unifi Controller, not including protocol or port.
TCP port used to connect to the Unifi Controller.
Web Request session created when connecting to the Unifi Controller.
If true, skips the certificate check when sending requests to the REST API, needed if using a self-signed certificate on Unifi Controller.

dev:remarks.maml:para: This example sets the API configuration values for BaseUri, Port, Protocol, and SkipCertificateCheck.
